data.title: Story 4- SHRINIVASANDA PARAKE Children's stories translated in Kodava Takk
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Baari Kodava Kathe Kekana! on Spotify. Story 4- SHRINIVASANDA PARAKE          Original story - Rohini Nilekani for Pratham Books. Translation - Shruthi MP                                                 Find the e-book on storyweaver.org.in
